targets.query:
from(bucket: "iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "9C:9C:1F:47:14:B7" or r["host"] == "9C:9C:1F:47:4F:81" or r["host"] == "C4:5B:BE:54:D1:52" or r["host"] == "E8:DB:84:98:C0:E6")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tsHtC" or r["_field"] == "tsHtF" or r["_field"] == "tsHumi" or r["_field"] == "tsTempC" or r["_field"] == "tsTempF" or r["_field"] == "tsType")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "iot")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tsHtC" or r["_field"] == "tsHtF" or r["_field"] == "tsHumi" or r["_field"] == "tsTempC" or r["_field"] == "tsTempF" or r["_field"] == "tsType")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
